      • fromJson

        @NonNull
public static ContentBlockingController.ContentBlockingException fromJson(@NonNull
                                                                                   JSONObject savedException)
                                                                            throws JSONException
        Returns a ContentBlockingException reconstructed from JSON.
        Parameters:
        savedException - A JSONObject representation of a saved exception; should be the output of toJson().
        Returns:
        A ContentBlockingException reconstructed from the supplied JSONObject.
        Throws:
        JSONException - if the JSONObject cannot be converted for any reason.
